ch.aplu.nxtsim

Class Gear

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.aplu.jgamegrid.Actor
      • ch.aplu.nxtsim.Part
        • ch.aplu.nxtsim.Gear
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ch.aplu.jgamegrid.GGActorCollisionListener, ch.aplu.jgamegrid.GGBorderListener, ch.aplu.jgamegrid.GGTileCollisionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class Gear
extends Part
    Combines two motors on an axis to perform a car-like movement.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class ch.aplu.jgamegrid.Actor

        gameGrid, nbCycles

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Gear()
      Creates a gear instance with right motor plugged into port A, left motor plugged into port B.
